content:
@Ryan Brush who owns Bunsen now?

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/63652256/what-are-the-dependencies-that-will-allow-cerner-bunsen-to-load-fhir-r4-ukcore
I tagged a group internally that is maintaining this today

There are some engineers at Cerner that are still maintaining it on GitHub, although it's not something I'm able to be significantly involved in any longer. It does look like one of them answered that question on Stack Overflow. I think posting bugs in the GitHub project will get more visibility as well, but if there are specific questions I can probably reach out to my former Cerner colleagues to find a more direct contact.
